organization.title: Livewire Data Platform Project Organization
organization.description: A Dataset Publisher Organization as a foaf:Agent object.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be org:Organization for each identified organization.

name.title: Organization Name
name.description: A full formatted name of an organization.

reference.title: Livewire Data Platform Project Reference
reference.description: A Livewire Data Platform Project reference object.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be lw:reference for each identified reference.

referenceTitle.title: Reference Title
referenceTitle.description: A full formatted title for the reference.

referenceCategory.title: Reference Category
referenceCategory.description: The optional category, if any, for the reference.

vcard.title: Livewire Data Platform Project ContactPoint vCard

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be vcard:Contact for contactPoint.

fn.title: Contact Name
fn.description: A full formatted name, e.g., Firstname Lastname.

distribution.title: Livewire Data Platform Project Dataset Distribution
distribution.description: A distribution for a dataset within a project catalog.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Distribution for each Distribution.

downloadURL.title: Download URL
downloadURL.description: URL providing direct access to a downloadable file of a dataset.

mediaType.title: Media Type
mediaType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution's downloadURL.

format.title: Format
format.description: A human-readable description of the file format of a distribution.

accessURL.title: Access URL
accessURL.description: URL providing indirect access to the distribution.

conformsTo.title: Data Standard
conformsTo.description: URI used to identify a standardized specification the distribution conforms to.

describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
describedBy.description: URL for the data dictionary for the distribution found at the downloadURL.

describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type
describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution's describedBy URL.

accessRole.title: Access Role
accessRole.description: Access role(s), if applicable, which users must hold in order to access this distribution.

identifier.title: Unique Distribution Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for the distribution as maintained within a project catalog.

identifierSchema.title: Distribution Identifier Schema
identifierSchema.description: Structural description of this distribution object's identifier.
identifierSchema.$comment: This is an LDP-specific extension. TODO: Flesh this out to ensure structural validity for the LDP UI and backend.

shortName.title: Short Distribution Name
shortName.description: Concise name for this object; should be human-readable; may be munged for use in UI.

dataset.title: Livewire Data Platform Project Dataset
dataset.description: The metadata format for Livewire Data Platform Project datasets.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Dataset for each Dataset.

accessLevel.description: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public).
accessLevel.title: Public Access Level

rights.title: Rights
rights.description: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies. This should also provide an explanation for the selected "accessLevel" including instructions for how to access a restricted file, if applicable, or explanation for why a "non-public" or "restricted public" data assetis not "public," if applicable. Text, 255 characters.

accrualPeriodicity.title: Frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is published.

bureauCode.title: Bureau Code
bureauCode.description: Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C in the format of 015:010.

contactPoint.title: Dataset Point(s) of Contact
contactPoint.description: Contact person(s)'s name and contact information for the asset.
contactPoint.$comment: This is an LDP-specific change: allow multiple POCs for a dataset.

describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
describedBy.description: URL to the data dictionary for the dataset or API. Note that documentation other than a data dictionary can be referenced using Related Documents as shown in the expanded fields.

describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type
describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the dataset's describedBy URL.

conformsTo.title: Data Standard
conformsTo.description: URI used to identify a standardized specification the dataset conforms to.

dataQuality.title: Data Quality
dataQuality.description: Whether the dataset meets the agency's Information Quality Guidelines (true/false).

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: A container for the array of Distribution objects for this dataset.

identifier.title: Unique Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for the dataset or API as maintained within an Agency catalog or database.

keyword.title: Tags
keyword.description: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.

landingPage.title: Homepage URL
landingPage.description: Alternative landing page used to redirect user to a contextual, Agency-hosted "homepage" for the Dataset or API when selecting this resource from the Data.gov user interface.

license.title: License
license.description: The license the dataset or API is published with. See Open Licenses for more information.

modified.title: Last Update
modified.description: Most recent date on which the dataset was changed, updated or modified.

primaryITInvestmentUII.title: Primary IT Investment UII
primaryITInvestmentUII.description: For linking a dataset with an IT Unique Investment Identifier (UII).

programCode.title: Program Code
programCode.description: Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory. Use the format of 015:001.

references.title: Related Documents
references.description: Related documents such as technical information about a dataset, developer documentation, etc.

spatial.title: Spatial
spatial.description: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset. Could include a spatial region like a bounding box or a named place.

systemOfRecords.title: System of Records
systemOfRecords.description: If the systems is designated as a system of records under the Privacy Act of 1974, provide the URL to the System of Records Notice related to this dataset.

temporal.title: Temporal
temporal.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset (i.e., a start and end date of applicability for the data).

isPartOf.title: Collection
isPartOf.description: The collection of which the dataset is a subset.

theme.title: Category
theme.description: Main thematic category of the dataset.

title.title: Title
title.description: Human-readable name of the asset. Should be in plain English and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.

accessRestriction.title: Dataset Access Restriction
accessRestriction.description: Access restriction, if any, applied in conjunction with accessLevel to determine whether this dataset can be accessed by a given platform user.

doiName.title: Dataset DOI Name
doiName.description: The DOI name for the dataset.

identifierSchema.title: Dataset Identifier Schema
identifierSchema.description: Structural description of this dataset object's identifier.
identifierSchema.$comment: This is an LDP-specific extension. TODO: Flesh this out to ensure structural validity for the LDP UI and backend.

shortName.title: Short Dataset Name
shortName.description: Concise name for this object; should be human-readable; may be munged for use in UI.

title: Livewire Data Platform Catalog
description: A project catalog of datasets available through the Liveware Data Platform. Derived from Project Open Data.

@context.title: Metadata Context
@context.description: URL or JSON object for the JSON-LD Context that defines the schema used.

@id.title: Metadata Catalog ID
@id.description: IRI for the JSON-LD Node Identifier of the Catalog. This should be the URL of the data.json file itself.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Catalog for the Catalog.

describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
describedBy.description: URL for the JSON Schema file that defines the schema used.

accessLevel.title: Project/Catalog Access Level
accessLevel.description: The extent to which information about this project/catalog can be made publicly-available. Choices: public (information is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (information is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (information is not available to members of the public).

accessRestriction.title: Project/Catalog Access Restriction
accessRestriction.description: Access restriction, if any, applied in conjunction with accessLevel to determine whether information about this project/catalog can be accessed by a given platform user.

citation.title: Catalog Citation
citation.description: Citation to be used in publications for which the catalog/project's data was used.

contactPoint.title: Catalog Point(s) of Contact
contactPoint.description: Contact person(s)'s name and contact information for the project catalog.

description.title: Catalog Description
description.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.

identifier.title: Unique Catalog Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for the the project catalog.

identifierSchema.title: Catalog Identifier Schema
identifierSchema.description: Structural description of this catalog object's identifier.
identifierSchema.$comment: This is an LDP-specific extension. TODO: Flesh this out to ensure structural validity for the LDP UI and backend

participatingOrganizations.title: Participating Organization(s)
participatingOrganizations.description: Organization(s) who participated in the project producing the dataset(s) within this catalog.

references.title: Catalog References
references.description: References, if any, for the project producing the datasets within this catalog.

shortName.title: Short Catalog Name
shortName.description: Concise name for this object; should be human-readable; may be munged for use in UI.

title.title: Catalog Title
title.description: Human-readable name of the catalog. Should be in plain English and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.
